items.sentence: It would be more fun to do this with you than by myself.
I felt guilty, even though I hadn't done anything wrong.
I regret to inform you that your mother-in-law has died.
Tom went on doing that, even though we asked him not to.
Some people gave Tom some odd looks, but he didn't care.
Tom didn't like the house he'd inherited, so he sold it.
Tom has been complaining about not earning enough money.
How many times have you and Tom gone to Boston together?
Tom and Mary probably aren't as old as everybody thinks.
I had no idea that you were planning on going to Boston.
